mod.name: Stick War 2: Hell on Earth
mod.description: A unique twist on the original Stick War 2 campaign: you have double the economy, but the enemy respawns. Do you think you can take them down before they get too strong?
mod.developers:
Programming: RinasSam.
Playtesting: 75g and Bestfriend.
Music: Bobby Prince.
Concept: id Software.
mod.bugs: Lag upon extended play is normal.
